title: Understanding the Concept
text: When you calculate an average from a sample, what are you trying to determine about the larger group? 🤔

title: Defining Terms
text: A statistic is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. How does this relate to the average height calculated?

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: The average height from the sample plots is a measure of the sample, not the entire population. What is this called?
